chapters.title: Chapter 7: Pitfalls and Tripwires
chapters.info: Lord Pelivar Coelan, p. 154 (186)—Andoran noble, leader of a strong House that supported Morgase during the Succession. Morgase exiled him from Caemlyn as per Gaebril's suggestion, but hopes he will still support her when she comes to claim the throne. He is one of the lords in Andor who arrested Naean and Elenia for claiming the Lion Throne; he supports Dyelin as Regent until Elayne returns.
